Work

foodio

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,ES6,jQuery,Node

mobile app that finds random restaurants based on a city dropdown, provides 5 random results, displays detail when a restaurant is clicked, and saves favorites in local storage

View Project on GitHub

password-generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

uses alerts to accept password criteria of length and up to 4 different charsets and displays a password meeting that criteria in a text box

View Project on GitHub

taskmaster-pro

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

a task tracking site that uses dynamic html, Bootstrap, local storage, CSS custom styling, and JQuery/Javascript to display tasks and allow drag-and-drop functionality between status boxes and a functional trash footer
